title.value: IHE Security Types Code set for use with CapabilityStatement

description.value: The [IHE](http://www.ihe.net) SecurityTypes code system with canonical URI of http://profiles.ihe.net/fhir/ihe.securityTypes.fhir/CodeSystem/securityTypes is defined to be the set of well-defined security types for RESTful or other endpoint, for use with FHIR CapabilityStatement. The set of codes is intended to be extensible.

copyright.value: Some content from IHE® Copyright © 2020 [IHE International, Inc](http://www.ihe.net/Governance/#Intellectual_Property).

definition.value: Use of ATNA server-authenticated-TLS, and XUA profiled SAML for client/user authentication.
Use of ATNA server-authenticated-TLS, and IUA profiled OAuth for client/user authentication.
